body: I use the honeybee to calculate artificial lighting, but the result of the settlement is zero.I uploaded the IES files and grasshopper files.Please help me have a look at what's the problem

replies.body: Hi Bill, I think the issue had to do with a bug in the previous version of that component. If you update your Honeybee v[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/G834pRjVCIHNOIQhnuABVgh673JqeMcecjZHg7cE6Ad5AKn60FSMd3yQMfoNzNlwqkLDe5xHa4J-QYSMy9VRZyoiALQq9rms/10182016102028AM.png)ersion to the latest version using, Honeybee_Update Honeybee everything should work. See attached. Sarith
Thank you！I think it must be the problem.I have tried but failed, maybe I need to check my software when I have time.
